page.title: 14BIOGRAPHY
page.content: This is a scattered farming community, with not many local notable people, but many business people have country residences here. Mrs. Kenning of Kennings Motors lives in the area,also the Misses Bassett of the well-known Bassett's Licquorice Allsorts family. Ted Moult, a successful farmer and radio personality was evacuated to Raven House during the last war, perhaps that led to his affinity for farming later. At Packhorse Farm, a very old building, they supply Bed and Breakfast,as they did for travellers in the olden days, when it was an inn for the saltmen on the Salt Way to Sheffield. The Tomlinsons who run a large dairy farm were very proud to say that their land was mentioned in the original Domesday Book.
